extendedInfo.description: Share with WiFi. Wirelessly transfer phone files and media to laptops and other WiFi devices.Download shared phone files wirelessly with any WiFi device web browser. JoikuShare Free version: â Share phone photos and music (with Pro version, share ALL phone files and videos)â Share with laptops, tablets, phones and Smart TVsâ Download shared phone files wirelessly with any WiFi device web browser (with Pro, also UPLOAD wirelessly any files from laptop to phone)â Play phone music wirelessly with other WiFi devices (with Pro, also wireless phone VIDEO play)â View phone photos wirelessly with other WiFi devicesâ Share phone media securely also with Friend devicesâ No software installations needed in your laptop for wirelessly downloading phone filesâ 1-click WiFi Share Start and Stopâ Speaks 20 languages â Works also on Android tablets----------------------JoikuShare Pro with FULL FEATURE SET available (only EUR/USD 2.99):â Share ALL phone files (also videos and all phone files and file folders)â Upload files wirelessly from laptop to your phoneâ Navigate and Manage phone media and files remotely with a laptop browserâ Play also phone videos wirelessly with other WiFi devicesâ Easy Pro upgrade from JoikuShare app. You can also purchase Pro version directly via Google play.----------------------Using JoikuShare is easy:For How to use, FAQ, support and more product information, please enter the developer product site at http://www.joiku.com/joikushare1. Make sure your Android device is connected to a local WiFi network or use your Android device WiFi hotspot for WiFi connection. Other devices need to connect to the same WiFi network as your Android device.2. Open JoikuShare and tap "Start WiFi Share" to turn on wireless sharing. Under "Shared files" -view you can select your device media and files to share with Friend devices requiring sharing session specific Friend password.3. Type the web link shown by JoikuShare to other device's web browser (or use the QR code). Login either as a Friend or device Administrator to download and play your Android device files and media.  4. Tap "Stop WiFi Share" to end your file sharing session.Under Settings menu you will find administrator and ease-of-use customization features for WiFi file sharing and user tutorial.----------------------JoikuShare WiFi File Share app is created by Joiku, creator of JoikuSpot WiFi hotspot, JoikuSpeed and Joiku PhoneUsage. Similar to AirDroid, Kies Air and WiFi File Transfer. Learn more of Joiku WiFi Share app benefits and unique features like Friend sharing at the product web site http://www.joikushare.com and in facebook at http://www.facebook.com/joikushare.----------------------Joiku Tips for use of WiFi for wireless transfer of phone files:â No WiFi around for WiFi File Transfer? Why not use Android's own portable WiFi hotspot? Turn on portable hotspot under Android Wireless and networks settings (more settings - tethering and portable hotspot) and enjoy WiFi connection everywhere!

reviews.title: Better Free Apps Available in Android Market
reviews.comment: App named \"Fast File Transfer\" is free and better than Joikoshare...
reviews.author: khan shoeb

reviews.title: Excellent! Will upgrade to Pro!
reviews.comment: This product is excellent, sharing and streaming my samsung s3 media works like a charm! Will upgrade to Pro!
reviews.author: julia ojala

reviews.title: Wifi hotspot turns JoikuShare into powerful tool
reviews.comment: Using my Android phone own hotspot for wifi connection for JoikuShare (AndroidAP - portable hotspot).  This way JoikuShare just simply works in a split second.  Downloading phone shared media (photos, music, videos..) is easy with the HTML5 browser experience (laptops, other phones).   Uploading PC files works (just uploaded a PPT into my Android with JoikuShare program).   Playing music on TV is super cool. Its like airplay but the other way around. Now can kill the AppleTv and save one extra HDMI slot on my TV to something more useful. Just opening my TV browser and connecting to my Android to stream phone media wirelessly.
reviews.author: Tom Ojala

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.comment: I was waiting for this product since 10 months. I am happy it released here. I have previously used joikuspot premium on my nokia device and sharing through wifi is such a cool idea. Well even now it has not been released on nokia.. I hate symbian. Well you should try it. I know due to lack of popularity it has less likes but this product is worth using.
reviews.author: Nishant Bagoria

reviews.title: Why does it downgrade to free
reviews.comment: I have a pro version which I paid few Months ago why does it downgrade to free when I click update, not cool!
reviews.author: Ron Tamanio

reviews.title: Not simple enough
reviews.comment: I buy and use Joiku Spot long time ago when android phones not exist yet. Its a very impresive software, I can connect my ipod touch, laptop or my friends device to internet so easy from my Nokia E71.  Now I got email from Joiku tell me they releasing a new software for android devices. Its still a great software, let me send my files to my friends phone (unfortunately with efford) And I already have a software to send and receive my files to a PC in same wifi network and manage my phone.  This software is great, but days when people difficult using this kind of software is over. Please make more simple, I will support and buying full version :)
reviews.author: Arif Diamanta

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Works well and is very easy to use! Transferring photos from my phone to laptop couldn\'t be easier with phone\'s own WiFi hotspot at the cottage where other WiFis are not available. I really recommend to get to know this awesome app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was using on symbian ..
reviews.comment: Now this awesome app on android will chek it out !
reviews.author: Jeanfrancois Joseph

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Only photo sharing in the free version.all other features disabled
reviews.author: Dil shah Dirar
